modName: Borgakh - Just a vanilla change - Potential marriage
summary: There\'s a lot of woman in Skyrim who can be married besides Ysolda, Muiri or Mjoll, but when I saw them they\'re just... not my style. Common, I dont like them. So, here\'s a little effort to bring you another option: Borgakh, one of the ignored wifes.
descriptionHtml:
[i][color=olive]Everytime I played Skyrim, I tryed to make different ways, to [b]experiment[/b] new quest, to get mods, so I can get a new game. Well, there\'s some decisions that I ever take again and again... because there\'s no other option. Like marriage.
So, I was reading [b]the potential marriage vanilla women list... and of [u]there\'s 28 girls[/b][/u], but I allways choose beetwen 4 of 5 (Ysolda, Muiri if play de DB, Mjoll if I got the mod to kick Aerin out, Sylgja, or maybe Grelka. And thats it.[/i][/color]

Reading the lore of [b]Borgakh the Steel Heart[/b], she catches my attention. She\'s got a nice background history (at least, better than Ysolda), and is more bravely than Mjoll or any other woman. But, I saw her in-game and didnt like me so much. [url=http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Borgakh_the_Steel_Heart]Here[/url]\'s an overview:

Well, I just make she (or her, I dont know, sorry for bad english) [i]a little more nordic, more femmenine, and want to share it so you can expand your wife\'s option too. [/i]

By the way, Im using the [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2812]Better Females by Bella[/url] but [b]this is [u]just a vanilla change[/b][/u]. If you have got another texture\'s for woman (or if you just have the vanilla version), [u]its [b]NOT[/b] a problem[/u]. Probabbly you should get a less smooth skin, but the face change should be there. Anyways, I really recommend the mod.


[i]If you like it, you may try my other vanilla changes:[/i]

[b]Dravynea the Stoneweaver[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24694[/url]

[b]Brelyna Maryon[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24435]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24435[/url]

[b]Avrusa Sarethi[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24500[/url]

[b]Ysolda[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24413[/url]

[b]Lydia[/b]: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24661]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24661[/url]


PS: The armour that she wears on the pics, its actually the vanilla armour that she have. Depends on the player\'s level.
author: ArouetX
